query: UPDATE screens SET isAdopted = 1 WHERE id IN (SELECT id FROM (SELECT id FROM screens WHERE title LIKE 'Meet%' AND imagePath IS NOT NULL LIMIT 2) AS t);
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway03.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2KjT5kGWaGHMws6.75433b4e530a --database aMDMXCoQ2ycSYTjhkKKJzm --execute UPDATE screens SET isAdopted = 1 WHERE id IN (SELECT id FROM (SELECT id FROM screens WHERE title LIKE 'Meet%' AND imagePath IS NOT NULL LIMIT 2) AS t);
